title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 691/97 of 18 April 1997 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2698/93, (EC) No 1590/94 and (EC) No 2305/95 in the pigmeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 691/97 of 18 April 1997 amending Regulations (EEC) No 2698/93, (EC) No 1590/94 and (EC) No 2305/95 in the pigmeat sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The final subparagraph of Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 2698/93 is hereby deleted.
The final subparagraph of Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 1590/94 is hereby deleted.
The final subparagraph of Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 2305/95 is hereby deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 328, 30. 12. 1995, p. 31.
(2) OJ No L 338, 28. 12. 1996, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 245, 1. 10. 1993, p. 80.
(4) OJ No L 338, 28. 12. 1996, p. 71.
(5) OJ No L 167, 1. 7. 1994, p. 16.
(6) OJ No L 233, 30. 9. 1995, p. 45.
(7) OJ No L 277, 30. 10. 1996, p. 17.
